00036     $rulenumber = $_GET['rulenumber'];
00037     $rule = $_SESSION['pfw']->nat->rules[$rulenumber];
00038 
00039     if ($_SESSION['edit']['type'] != 'nat') {
00040         unset ($_SESSION['editsave']);
00041         $_SESSION['edit']['type'] = 'nat';
00042     }
00043 
00044     if ($_SESSION['edit']['rulenumber'] != $rulenumber) {
00045         unset ($_SESSION['editsave']);
00046         $_SESSION['edit']['rulenumber'];
00047     }
00048     
00049     if (!isset($_SESSION['edit']['save']) && isset($rule['type'])) {
00050         unset ($_SESSION['edit']['save']);
00051         $_SESSION['edit']['save'] = $_SESSION['pfw']->nat->rules[$rulenumber];
00052     }
00053 
00054   if (isset($_GET['dropinterface'])) {
00055     $_SESSION['pfw']->nat->delEntity ("interface", $rulenumber, $_GET['dropinterface']);
00056     reload();
00057   }
00058 
00059   if (isset($_GET['dropproto'])) {
00060     $_SESSION['pfw']->nat->delEntity ("proto", $rulenumber, $_GET['dropproto']);
00061     reload();
00062   }
00063 
00064   if (isset($_POST['addinterface']) && !strpos($_POST['addinterface'], "macro")) {
00065     $_SESSION['pfw']->nat->addEntity("interface", $rulenumber, $_POST['addinterface']);
00066     reload();
00067   }
00068 
00069   if (isset($_POST['addproto']) && !strpos($_POST['addproto'], "rotocol")) {
00070     $_SESSION['pfw']->nat->addEntity("proto", $rulenumber, $_POST['addproto']);
00071     reload();
00072   }
00073 
00074     if (count($_POST)) {
00075         $_SESSION['pfw']->nat->rules[$rulenumber]['type'] =               $_POST['type'];
00076         $_SESSION['pfw']->nat->rules[$rulenumber]['pass'] =        ($_POST['pass'] ? true : "");
00077         if ($_POST['proto'] == 'tcpudp') {
00078             $_SESSION['pfw']->nat->addEntity("proto", $rulenumber, 'tcp');
00079             $_SESSION['pfw']->nat->addEntity("proto", $rulenumber, 'udp');
00080         }
00081         else {
00082             $_SESSION['pfw']->nat->rules[$rulenumber]['proto'] = $_POST['proto'];
00083         }
00084         $_SESSION['pfw']->nat->rules[$rulenumber]['from'] =               $_POST['from'];
00085         $_SESSION['pfw']->nat->rules[$rulenumber]['fromport'] =       $_POST['fromport'];
00086         $_SESSION['pfw']->nat->rules[$rulenumber]['to'] =               $_POST['to'];
00087         $_SESSION['pfw']->nat->rules[$rulenumber]['port'] =               $_POST['port'];
00088         $_SESSION['pfw']->nat->rules[$rulenumber]['natdest'] =    $_POST['natdest'];
00089         $_SESSION['pfw']->nat->rules[$rulenumber]['natdestport'] = $_POST['natdestport'];
00090         $_SESSION['pfw']->nat->rules[$rulenumber]['netmask'] =        $_POST['netmask'];
00091         $_SESSION['pfw']->nat->rules[$rulenumber]['comment'] =        $_POST['comment'];
00092 
00093         $_SESSION['pfw']->nat->rules[$rulenumber]['random']      = ($_POST['random'] ? true : "");
00094         $_SESSION['pfw']->nat->rules[$rulenumber]['source-hash'] = ($_POST['source-hash'] ? true : "");
00095         $_SESSION['pfw']->nat->rules[$rulenumber]['static-port'] = ($_POST['static-port'] ? true : "");
00096 
00097         $rule = $_SESSION['pfw']->nat->rules[$rulenumber];
00098     }
00099 
00100     /*
00101     * go back
00102     */
00103     if (isset($_POST['cancelme']) && ($_POST['cancelme'] == 'cancel')) {
00104 
00105         $_SESSION['pfw']->nat->rules[$rulenumber] = $_SESSION['edit']['save'];
00106         unset ($_SESSION['edit']);
00107         if (!isset($_SESSION['pfw']->nat->rules[$rulenumber]['type'])) {
00108             $_SESSION['pfw']->nat->del ($rulenumber);
00109         }
00110         header ("Location: nat.php");
00111     }
00112 
00113     if (isset($_POST['save']) && $_POST['save'] == "save and return") {
00114         unset ($_SESSION['edit']);
00115         header ("Location: nat.php");
00116     }

00127     $udp_selected = "";
00128     $tcpudp_selected = "";

00139         break;

00148         break;

00160 <script type="text/javascript">
00161 function hide(obj) {
00162     document.getElementById(obj).style.display='none';
00163 }
00164 function show(obj) {
00165     document.getElementById(obj).style.display='';
00166 }
00167 function hideshow(obj) {
00168     if (document.getElementById(obj).style.display == '') {
00169         document.getElementById(obj).style.display='none';
00170     } else {
00171         document.getElementById(obj).style.display='';
00172     }
00173 }
00174 
00175 function manual_hideall() {
00176   hide('basic');
00177   hide('pool');
00178   hide('examples');
00179 }
00180 
00181 function manual_showonly(obj) {
00182   manual_hideall();
00183   show(obj);
00184 }
